title: Drawing, Design for Six-legged Sideboard with Five Central Drawers, 1900–05
title_raw: Design for Six-legged Sideboard with Five Central Drawers
medium: Graphite, blue pencil, and pen and red ink, on thin cream  paper
inscribed: Inscribed in pen and blue ink at center below image: #45039 [up-pointing V] =LI [inverted U] / why UXS, and lower left: [illegible inscriptions]; in faded red ink lower right: A [square with dot in center] V. I [in verted U]; in blue pencil at top and left portions of sheet: [numerical notations indicating measurements]
creditline: Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society
description: Rectangular sideboard on six tapering, fluted, and turned legs; tripartide front with convex central section with three horizontal drawers flanked by two vertical drawers; low backsplash at back of top.

participants.person_name: The Lake St. Louis Historical Society

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, Design for Six-legged Sideboard with Five Central Drawers, 1900–05. Graphite, blue pencil, and pen and red ink, on thin cream  paper. 
Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society. 2000-69-6
